title: Added README.md and updated the table of contents in `documentation` folder
body:
Fixes #

### Context
The docs are hard to navigate

### Changes Made
- Added README.md and updated the table of contents in `documentation` folder
- https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/main/documentation/specs/rar-as-service.md - moved to `design` folder
- merged 2 pages on SDK resolvers
- "debugging on Mono" is moved to `deprecated` and not included to contents

### Testing


### Notes

commit.message: created the table of contents in `documentation` folder

nodes.body:
```suggestion
  * Hit command-space, type terminal, hit enter. Alternatively, hit magnifying glass (spotlight) in upper-right corner and search for terminal.
```
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-#Debugging with MacOS
+# Debugging with MacOS
 * Open terminal 
   * Hit command-space, type terminal, hit enter. Alternatively, hit magnifying glass (spotlight) in upper-right corner and search for terminal.)
